content: lion brand pattern # 578-c *cwe-socks pdf* skill level beginner + level 2 size adult medium directions for woman s sock size 9-11 for a larger sock use the next size larger hook wool-ease® thick & quick® article #640 2 balls *shown in wheat* crochet hook - size n-13 9 mm split ring stitch markers worked in row and rounds see also cottage slipper socks knit 1 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/cottage-slipper-socks-knit
